document.full_text: bartolo colon's ascension from faded star to viable major leaguer has reached its apex thus far, as colon pitched six and two-thirds stellar innings in the yankees' victory over the blue jays.
document.title: yankees 6, blue jays 2: yankees' colon throws back clock and pushes past blue jays
lines_and_colors: bartolo colon's ascension from faded star to viable major leaguer has reached its apex thus far, as colon pitched six and two-thirds stellar innings in the yankees' victory over the blue jays.
